references: A. Fransen, Conjectures on the Taylor series expansion coefficients of the Jacobian elliptic function sn(n,k), Math. Comp., 37 (1981), 475-497.
mathematica: j = 3; max = 17; coes = CoefficientList[#, k]& /@ ((CoefficientList[ Series[ JacobiSN[x, k], {x, 0, 2*max}], x] // Select[#, # =!= 0 &] &)*Table[(-1)^n*(2*n+1)!, {n, 0, max-1}] ) ; coes[[j+1 ;; -1]][[All, j+1]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 14 2013 *)
author: _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: Entered by hand and should be rechecked.
Typo in a(7) fixed by _Jean-François Alcover_, May 14 2013
